IStablePay

nodes.documentation: @dev This event is emitted when a swap execution has failed.
nodes.name: ExecutionTransferFailed

nodes.documentation: @dev This event is emitted when a swap has been executed successfully.

devdoc.author: StablePay <hi@stablepay.io>
devdoc.details: It defines the functions to swap and transfer any token (ERC20) or Ether into any pre-configured token (ERC20).As StablePay doesn't use its own liquidity to swap tokens/ether, StablePay supports swap any token if at least one registered swapping provider supports it.

transferWithEthers((uint256,uint256,uint.details: StablePay uses each swapping provider ordered in the keys provided as input to attempt the swapping/exchange ether/tokens.The provider keys list must be not empty in order to swap the tokens.

params.order: order instance which defines the data needed to make the swap (ether to token) and transfer.
params.providerKey: provider key to be used as liquidity providers in the swapping process.

transferWithTokens((uint256,uint256,uint.details: If the source and target tokens are the same, StablePay only transfers the amount of tokens defined in the order.Otherwise, StablePay uses each swapping provider ordered in the keys provided as input.The provider keys list must be not empty in order to swap the tokens.

params.order: order instance which defines the data needed to make the transfer and swap if needed.
params.providerKey: provider key to be used as liquidity providers in the swapping process.

transferWithEthers((uint256,uint256,uint.notice: It swaps and transfers a specific amount of ether (defined in the order and msg.value parameter) to a specific amount of tokens and finally transfers it to a receiver address.

transferWithTokens((uint256,uint256,uint.notice: It transfers (and swaps if needed) a specific amount of tokens (defined in the order) to a specific receiver.

userdoc.notice: This is the entry point to interact with the StablePay platform.
